entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student who begins the conversation with Harry, Ron, and Hermione. He asks if Harry has a wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who turns to Harry and says that they can help find what they are looking for.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is being asked by Seamus if he has a wand. He is also the one who is trying to decide whether or not to trust others with their mission.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who stands between Ron and Harry, and is able to hear Ron's whispered conversation. She agrees with Ron that they need the help of others.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who is mentioned as having warned Harry against telling anyone about the Horcruxes. He also trusted Snape, which led to tragic consequences.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character who was trusted by Dumbledore, but ultimately betrayed him and committed murder.

relationships.description: Ron helps Harry decide whether or not to trust others with their mission. Ron says that they can help find what they are looking for.
Hermione agrees with Ron that they need the help of others. She says 'I think Ron's right'.
Dumbledore trusted Snape, but this ultimately led to tragic consequences.
